title: Protozoa: one-celled animals
brief_description: Dr Roman Vishniac, scientist and microphotographer, identifies pseudopods, flagelettes, and ciliates, showing how they move, eat and reproduce. Provides examples of symbiosis, parasitism, and colonial organisations.
